metadata.Title: CVE-2020-12673 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium
metadata.Description:
In Dovecot before 2.3.11.3, sending a specially formatted NTLM request willcrash the auth service because of an out-of-bounds read.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2020-12673` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

dovecot-core - 1:2.2.22-1ubuntu2.13
dovecot-gssapi - 1:2.2.22-1ubuntu2.13
dovecot-imapd - 1:2.2.22-1ubuntu2.13
dovecot-ldap - 1:2.2.22-1ubuntu2.13
dovecot-lmtpd - 1:2.2.22-1ubuntu2.13
dovecot-lucene - 1:2.2.22-1ubuntu2.13
dovecot-managesieved - 1:2.2.22-1ubuntu2.13
dovecot-mysql - 1:2.2.22-1ubuntu2.13
dovecot-pgsql - 1:2.2.22-1ubuntu2.13
dovecot-pop3d - 1:2.2.22-1ubuntu2.13
dovecot-sieve - 1:2.2.22-1ubuntu2.13
dovecot-solr - 1:2.2.22-1ubuntu2.13
dovecot-sqlite - 1:2.2.22-1ubuntu2.13
mail-stack-delivery - 1:2.2.22-1ubuntu2.13
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: dovecot package in esm-infra/xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1:2.2.22-1ubuntu2.13').
